templates.template: Voyager with REST-VAS by Zabbix agent 2 active
templates.name: Voyager with REST-VAS by Zabbix agent 2 active
templates.description:
Get metrics from REST-VAS python project deploy on host. Executed by User parameters of Zabbix agent 2 active. 

REST-VAS: https://github.com/BadeSummer/REST-Voyager

preprocessing.error_handler_params: Unknow Error: can not get control data.

items.name: Control Data - TI
items.description: Actual Timing in Voyager format AAAA-MM-GG HH:MM:SS

items.name: Control Data - TIUTC
items.description: UTC Timing in Voyager format AAAA-MM-GG HH:MM:SS

items.name: Control Data - VOYSTAT
items.description: Actual Status of Voyager Application

items.name: Control Data - SETUPCONN
items.description: Indicate if all setup controls in Voyager are connected with true or false

items.name: Control Data - CCDCONN
items.description: Indicate if camera control is connected or not. True = connected. False if not connected or control is empty

items.name: Control Data - CCDTEMP
items.description: Temperature of cooling in Camera

items.name: Control Data - CCDPOW
items.description: Percentage of power used by Peltier

items.name: Control Data - CCDSETP
items.description: Temperature Set Point asked to Cooler

items.name: Control Data - CCDCOOL
items.description: True if Peltier is switched on or False if is switched off or Peltier is not present

items.name: Control Data - CCDSTAT
items.description: Status of cooling automa inside Voyager

items.name: Control Data - MNTCONN
items.description: Indicate if mount control is connected or not. True = connected. False if not connected or control is empty

items.name: Control Data - MNTPARK
items.description: Indicate if mount is parked. True = connected. False if not connected or control is empty

items.name: Control Data - MNTRA
items.description: Actual RA of Mount JNow

items.name: Control Data - MNTDEC
items.description: Actual DEC of Mount JNow

items.name: Control Data - MNTRAJ2000
items.description: Actual RA of Mount J2000

items.name: Control Data - MNTDECJ2000
items.description: Actual DEC of Mount J2000

items.name: Control Data - MNTAZ
items.description: Actual Azimuth of Mount

items.name: Control Data - MNTALT
items.description: Actual Altitude of Mount

items.name: Control Data - MNTPIER
items.description: Actual Pier of Mount (pierWest = Before Meridian, pierEast = After Meridian)

items.name: Control Data - MNTTFLIP
items.description: Time to Meridian Cross in HH:mm:SS if negative mean is before

items.name: Control Data - MNTSFLIP
items.description: Status of Meridian Flip in Voyager

items.name: Control Data - MNTTRACK
items.description: Indicate if the mount is tracking

items.name: Control Data - MNTSLEW
items.description: Indicate if the mount is slewing

items.name: Control Data - AFCONN
items.description: Indicate if Autofocus is connected. True = connected. False if not connected or control is empty

items.name: Control Data - AFTEMP
items.description: Temperature coming from Focuser. Some special value is possible

items.name: Control Data - AFPOS
items.description: Position of Focuser in Step. Some special value is possible

items.name: Control Data - SEQTOT
items.description: Total in seconds of all shot in a Sequence running

items.name: Control Data - SEQPARZ
items.description: Total in seconds of elapse shot in a Sequence Running

items.name: Control Data - GUIDECONN
items.description: Indicate if guide controls is connected or not. True = connected. False if not connected or control is empty

items.name: Control Data - GUIDESTAT
items.description: Status of guide inside Voyager

items.name: Control Data - DITHSTAT
items.description: Status of Dithering inside Voyager

items.name: Control Data - GUIDEX
items.description: Guide error in pixels in X axis

items.name: Control Data - GUIDEY
items.description: Guide error in pixels in Y axis

items.name: Control Data - PLACONN
items.description: Indicate if planetarium controls is connected or not. True = connected. False if not connected or control is empty

items.name: Control Data - PSCONN
items.description: Indicate if power supply is connected

items.name: Control Data - SEQNAME
items.description: Name of Sequence running

items.name: Control Data - SEQSTART
items.description: hh:mm:ss of sequence start

items.name: Control Data - SEQREMAIN
items.description: hh:mm:ss of remaining time to finish sequence

items.name: Control Data - SEQEND
items.description: hh:mm:ss of sequence end

items.name: Control Data - RUNSEQ
items.description: FileName of actually running Sequence, empty if no Sequence running

items.name: Control Data - RUNDS
items.description: FileName of actually running DragScript, empty if no DragScript running

items.name: Control Data - ROTCONN
items.description: Indicate if rotator control is connected. True = connected. False if not connected or control is empty

items.name: Control Data - ROTPA
items.description: Position Angle in Degree of the Rotator (-1 or ERROR VALUE mean unknown position)

items.name: Control Data - ROTSKYPA
items.description: Last Position Angle of the camera in the SKY like resolved in solving actions (-1 or ERROR VALUE = unknown position)

items.name: Control Data - ROTISROT
items.description: Indicate if the rotator is rotating. True = is rotating

items.name: Control Data - DOMECONN
items.description: Indicate if dome control is connected. True = connected. False if not connected or control is empty

items.name: Control Data - DOMESHUTTER
items.description: Indicate the status of Shutter in ASCOM string representation

items.name: Control Data - DOMEPA
items.description: Position Angle in Degree of the Dome

items.name: Control Data - DOMEISMOV
items.description: Indicate if the dome is rotating or shutter is moving. True = is rotating/moving
